title: Workshop on Designing Mobile Microlearning for Problem-Based Learning and Social Media Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic problem-based learning (PBL) concepts, social media utilization experience, and practical science field experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative eLearning Design (CoED) methodology-based PBL and social media-integrated education course for advanced science professionals in managerial/leadership roles, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Define real-world science problems using core PBL elements (problem, process, solution)
Design collaborative knowledge-sharing systems using social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook groups, etc.)
Plan mobile-friendly microlearning activities (e.g., under 5-minute videos/infographics)
Self-assess participant agency levels in PBL processes through formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
